<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dancing Scarf](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3074)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=637" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
<trait label="Visual" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=727" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 288 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn belt

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This long and billowing scarf is typically woven of silk or sheer fabric and adorned with bells or other jangling bits of shiny metal. It grants a +1 item bonus to Performance checks to dance. 

**Activate—Swirling Scarf** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104))   **Requirements** On your most recent action, you succeeded at a Performance check to dance; **Effect** You become [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) until the beginning of your next turn.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

</row>

</column>

pfs="Standard"
>
Dancing Scarf (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 288 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 609 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 650 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The scarf grants a +2 bonus. When you activate the scarf, you can also Stride up to half your Speed or Step.
